name: Phantom Agent
description:
-------------------------- PHANTOM AGENT --------------------------

Team Project for Webster's Video Game Production

FALL 2022

The world of ghosts has begun to breach the world of the living.
A near-death experience in a subway station has left you tethered
to both worlds, now possessing newfound spectral powers. Before
you can get used to them, ghosts start going on a rampage nearby.
It's up to you to use your abilities to save humanity.

CONTROLS:

WASD to move

J to Shoot

Tap Jump Twice to Double Jump

DISCLAIMER: There is a huge collision bug. There is a chance you
will be freed from the walls after some time but no guarantee.

-------------------------------- CREDITS --------------------------------

Tanner Boyd - Level Designer & World Builder & QA Tester

Isaac Jones - Pixel Artist & Animator

Jonathan Garcia - Sound & Music Designer

Ethan Cargill - Sound & Music Designer

Matthew Burton - As Batthew Murton

Special Thanks to Matthew Burton, Jon Merz, and Mike Breault
 for assistance in production.

Thanks to Josie, @Josabeanpwq, for assisting in the making of
the cover art
